title: Hint for why the South rightfully should continue to worry about Modi and his party?
selftext:
Probably crores of Indian citizens received a mail from the "**Prime Minister's Office**" <[no-reply@sampark.gov.in](mailto:no-reply@sampark.gov.in)\>  today about 'Pariksha Pe Charcha in their own language'!

And for Kannada and Telugu, names of the languages themselves are written incorrectly in the local script - a hint to how caring Modi and his party are towards non-Hindi languages?

Inb4 bhakts queue up to talk about intricacies with Indic script fonts, would an email from the PMO get sent with Hindi written as "**ह‌​िन्​दी**"?

&#x200B;

https://preview.redd.it/khktp83avcha1.jpg?width=1006&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=3f892aab66a1da4a651c9abd01399ba4912e3720
comments: Lol . Image not checking how the language is written in native script
Also Kashmiri is largely written in the Nastaliq script.

It’s actually ಕನ್ನಡ. Who writes these?? 
I didn’t even know what “Pariksha Pe Charcha” meant until one year of this program.
